\r
- Your email address and name (when you sign up for an account)\r
- Your IP address and browser "user agent" (in logs, which are periodically rotated)\r\n- Your actions performed on the website (edits, suggestions, and profile changes)\r\n- Aggregate website usage statistics (page views, general geographic breakdowns, device types)\r\n
